sentence: …colleague, Congressman Jim Moylan  of Guam. This legislation will codify the existing Invasive Species  Strike Teams program currently operated by the U.S. Fish and Wildlife  Service (FWS). These specialized teams play an essential role in  managing emerging invasive species, employing strategies tailored to  local conditions across the National Wildlife Refuge…
